newsitem.title: USA: Systems & Computer unit gets $5 mln deal.
newsitem.headline: Systems & Computer unit gets $5 mln deal.

text.p: SCT Utility Systems, a unit of Systems & Computer Technology Corp, said Tuesday it has signed a $5-million software contract with the Public Service Co of New Mexico.
Under the contract, SCT will deploy its Banner customer information, contact and electronic work queue systems, it said.
Public Service Co of New Mexiso is a utility providing electric and gas service to more than 1.2 million people in more than 100 communities in New Mexico.
SCT provides advanced application software to meet the global needs of public and private utilities.
